meanings.definition: A card used to record the hours worked by an employee.
meanings.sent1: I filled out my timecards at the end of the week.
meanings.sent2: The HR department collects our timecards every Friday.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting my timecards at home made me late for work.
meanings.sent4: Her timecards were like a map of her dedication to her job.
meanings.sent5: The timecards were a reminder of the hours I put into my work.

meanings.definition: A system for tracking and recording hours worked by employees.
meanings.sent1: The company implemented a new digital system for timecards.
meanings.sent2: Using timecards helps the company keep track of employee hours.
meanings.sent3: The timecards system made payroll much easier to manage.
meanings.sent4: In a way, timecards are like a diary of our workdays.
meanings.sent5: The accuracy of the timecards system ensures fair payment for all employees.
